front.title: IEEE Draft Guide to Installation of Foundations for Transmission Line Structures

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Various approaches to good construction practices that could improve the installation of transmission line structure foundations are presented. Spread foundations, drilled shaft foundations, pile foundations, and anchors are treated. This guide is intended to be used as a reference source for those involved in the ownership, design, and construction of transmission structures.
